author: Gabriela
review: This apt does not seem to care about the road conditions in the actual complex. My car got stuck twice and had to call out of work for two days in a row. When I asked if they were going to take care of this they pretty much told me that

author: Ryan King
review: I feel bad for the tenants who are living there. The management for this complex are terrible price gougers. Rent used to be 1300 just a few years ago, and every single year they have hiked it up more than $100+. I implore everyone to

author: Mikennah Schwing
review: My partner and I lived here for about six months and really enjoyed it! The apartments were nice and the fire places and large tub were a nice touch. The staff is super friendly and helpful and are really looking out for your best interest.

author: Steve Avila
review: Ive been here for two years and just upgraded to a two bedroom due to a room mate moving in with me.  Both apartments were completely remodeled with modern fixtures and flooring.  Bob does a great job of keeping things maintained and Sarah

author: Mia Stone
review: Trying to get a hold of the people who work at the front desk is an absolute nightmare. It took me multiple tries across multiple days, and no one getting back the voicemails I left, to get someone on the phone. Then when they finally

author: R. V.
review: I very much enjoyed living in the Maple Park community. The location is great, the apartments are beautiful and the staff is excellent! They're honest, fair, kind and understanding. Ever when the pandemic began their professionalism remained in tact. I had a great time living here and highly recommended this property.

author: Jared Larson
review:
We loved renting from Maple Park Apartments.
Forced to rent sight-unseen (we signed the lease in New York) we were prepared for literally anything. We got so lucky to have chosen these apartments. The

author: Kellsy Triplet
review: Ive been living here for close to two years now. Most everything has been pretty bare able up until recently. Rent has went way up despite their being no updates and things are getting broken down. I cant get anyone to fix the electrical

author: Gail Leclair
review: First off the staff is A1. Welcoming and friendly they really do the best they can with what they have. My wife and I stayed in two different sizes during our time at Maple Park each had their perks!

author: Dan Drayer
review: I have lived here for nearly a year now and it's safe to say the best apartment complex I've ever lived in. The new management really turned this place into feeling like a home. Very friendly staff that are always accommodating.

author: Natalie Storm
review: I lived at Maple Park Apartments for just over a year. From day one, I felt very comfortable. They had availabliliy when nobody else in town seemed to have any openings. Our apartment was very nicely cleaned and repaired before move in, and

author: Alfred Fleming
review: The complex is kept up well and the staff is respectful of the residents.  We moved here because we have dogs and all of the staff is very accepting of the dogs.  I have told people that I know if they need a place to live this would be a good choice.  It is ideally located to many different places around the city.  It is also quiet.

author: Paul Hyde
review: Maple Park Apartments had absolutely horrid management in the past. Their currently dealing with a book-keeping nightmare. Suhrco, the property management company which oversees the property, recently hired an entirely new staff at this

author: Richard Ohana
review: Rented here in 2016-2018 and it was one of the best apartment living situations that I have had. Staff was not particularly friendly, but they were tremendously helpful in getting things done and assisting in sublets.

author: Scott Furniss
review: Maple Park is a great place to live! Best value for what you get and management is responsive helpful and friendly!  As long as you communicate you should have no problems here.  The pool bbq and other amenities are great!

author: Avery Hindman
review: This is by far one of the best apartment complexes I have lived in in Bellingham. The people in the office are always so nice the apartments located in a perfect location and the price is really good. I could not recommend this place enough!

author: Dolola Ava
review: It's an apartment complex with bad communication between staff members. I gave it one star for having open spaces, another for being close to WWU and Fred Meyer and another overall for just being a decent apartment complex. If you are a

author: Kylan Childers
review: Been here a month and am already pretty fed up. The facility and apartments themselves aren't bad at all (dryers all suck, but I've found that that's pretty much to be expected in apartment life), but what really gets to me is the staff

author: Liam Malley
review: This is a great apartment complex. The people are nice and easy to work with, and the pool/hot tub/ gym make all the difference. Never had any issues with management.

author: Wade Deitrick
review: Expensive for the quality, but it's close to town and school. Maintenance is getting better, management must be tough to deal with. Tonya at the leasing office is great, she gets it. She volunteers as much help as she can.

author: McDaniel Corbett
review:
As a college student I love Maple Park Apartments for a variety of reasons.

Firstly the assistant manager Tanya is super awesome, who will help you and try

author: Justin Jijina
review: I lived here for three years, the people in the front office were a joy to work with and would replace or help with damaged or old appliances within a couple days of learning about it. Prompt and great service.

author: Solar Eclipse
review: The matenice team is exceptional! They really work hard to make sure you enjoy living there

author: night fire yt
review: Great no problems yet just expensive

author: Johan van der veen
review: Pretty good apartments in a pretty good location for a pretty good price.  Staff on the complex is great!

author: TYLER WALD
review: Failed to get holding deposit back. Terrible service all year long takes about a month to get anything fixed. Just a complete joke of a complex with terrible management. AVOID AT All COSTS.

author: Kyle LaRoche
review: I give the apartment complex 4 stars bc its an average place with close proximity to western and fred meyer.

author: Brittney Segel
review: Friends live here and they love it and my daughter loves using their playground

author: Scarlette
review: Best people Ive ever rented from hands down. Love living here

author: Dalton Hunt
review: Poor employees that seem to hate their job.  That shows in every moment that they cant do their jobs properly.

author: Conrad Norris
review: There arent any lights and it can be hard to get ahold of the office sometimes

author: Steve Skippy Austin
review: Trashy damn place. Bad part of town. Don't like knowing I have relatives living here.

author: Rebecca Kinley
review: Damn, like who wants to pay 1350 for rent for a one bedroom.

author: Rhonda Doughty
review: Cute apartments rent is way to much.

author: Angry Child
review: Custom service was good

author: Te Stacy
review: Great place to live

author: Saad Almutairi
review: There are expensive!

author: Floyd Sharp
review: nice apartment complex

author: Riley Harmon
review: Cozy apartments.

author: Marissa Avalos
review: huh
